csongor bartus

web designer & developer

scatter

scatter is a local deals & advertising startup bringing offers near to you.

my task was to create a series of landing pages which deliver the message.

Services

services
logo, responsive web design, and front-end development
technologies
jekyll, liquid, ruby, html5, css3, jquery, sass, and compass

responsive & full screen

the founders wanted a presentation-like solution: one message on a screen and sliding navigation.

making this requirement work on all devices was the technical challenge of this project.

big typography

every major feature of Scatter was presented in a single sentence taking as much screen estate as possible to deliver the impact.

lean design

through the design process we've used and reused a single design element, the rounded border, coming from the first letter of the Scatter logo.

re-using components makes the design fit and the experience seamless.

big background images

since Scatter has their web and mobile app ready we could create perfect background images featuring screenshots of their real product.

the logo

simple and expressive, made only with HTML and CSS.

csongor is one of the few unicorns available today.

working with him you'll get more. A product instead of a simple website.
